en.name: Olivier F.
en.title: Full Stack JS Developer
en.about: From 🎵+Music to 💻+Code, I transitioned into frontend/fullstack development during the pandemic, driven by a passion for problem-solving and creativity. After completing 🚀+Le+Réacteur bootcamp, I was fortunate to join 🥷+Ninja Partners where I myself developed a large size AWS fullstack project, and my last project was a 📱+Telegram+Crypto+Mining+App. Currently living between Thailand and Russia, and between pampers and code I work with ⚛️+React, ⚡+Next.js, 🔌+REST+APIs, and 🗄️+databases, with ☁️+AWS experience. See my full stack skills & Questions 👇🏼
en.database: SQL -> D1 Cloudflare, NoSQL -> Dynamo, MongoDb,
en.environment: AWS -> Cognito , IAM , Amplify, DynamoDb; Cloudflare Worker
